title: Narrative Prop
description: A named object related to or interacting with characters that is implied or understood to be necessary for the narrative, a Narrative Prop is one implied by the narrative.

name.title: Narrative Prop Name
name.description: A human readable name for the prop

description.title: Narrative Prop Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative prop

propType.title: Prop type
propType.description: A departmental catagorization for the prop.
